                 https://absynth-vibe-coding.github.io/

                  If you like this follow me on my 
               YouTube channel Electric Dreams, thx! 
                 
                     HeartMula for ComfyUI v1.2

                        Better speed: cfg 1
         codec_steps 1-5: 1 "fast" and still really good quality
                   2: better quality and still ok speed
   
                     Minimum 16gb VRAM, it uses all of it, 
           so dont watch videos while you use this node ;-)


                  Quantizaton: saves VRAM -> Faster

                  - none - Full precision (default)
                  - int8 - ~50% VRAM reduction
                  - int4 - ~75% VRAM reduction (uses nf4 quantization)
                
                         20 sec= 250 steps                  
                         40 sec= 500 steps
                         60 sec= 750 steps
 
                  Custom Tags try for example: 
     energetic, electronic, synthesizer, drum machine, self- discovery
          
              more tags on https://heartmula.github.io/

[Verse 1]
There was a time I used to look into my father's eyes
In a happy home, I was a king, I had a golden throne
Those days are gone, now the memory's on the wall
I hear the songs from the places where I was born

[Pre-Chorus]
Up on that hill across the blue lake
That's where I had my first heartbreak
I still remember how it all changed
My father said

[Chorus]
Don't you worry, don't you worry, child
See, Heaven's got a plan for you
Don't you worry, don't you worry now
Yeah

[Build]
Don't you worry, don't you worry now
Yeah

[Drop]
Don't you worry, don't you worry now
Yeah

[Verse 2]
There was a time, I met a girl of a different kind

I still hear the songs remindin' me of a friend
